results.description: A select committee inquiry says the English Football League should "share the blame" for Bury's financial decline.
results.shortTitle: EFL should pay Bury reparations - MPs
results.title: Bury: EFL should apologise and pay reparations to expelled club, say MPs

thumbnail.altText: Bury fan stands at the gates of Gigg Lane

results.description: Bury are given a 35-day extension after a winding-up petition brought by HM Revenue & Customs is again adjourned in the High Court.
results.shortTitle: Bury case adjourned again in High Court
results.title: Bury FC: HM Revenue & Customs winding-up order adjourned until December

results.description: The money would have come from Bill Kenwright's own fortune but was still banned by league rules.
results.shortTitle: Everton chairman made £1m offer to help Bury FC
results.title: Bury FC: Everton chairman in £1m offer to help stricken club

results.description: Expelled EFL side Bury say the club is "not dead" and distance themselves from the potential formation of a phoenix club.
results.shortTitle: Expelled EFL club Bury 'not dead'
results.title: Bury 'not dead' as Shakers distances themselves from phoenix club

thumbnail.altText: A coffin in tribute to Bury FC

results.description: Non-league Chichester City - the lowest ranked club in the FA Cup - receive a bye to the second round following Bury's removal from the competition.
results.shortTitle: Chichester City receive FA Cup bye
results.title: FA Cup first round draw: Eighth-tier Chichester City receive bye to second round

results.description: The Football League is accused of "failing to execute" its own rules in the demise of Bury earlier this year.
results.shortTitle: EFL 'failed to execute rules' on Bury
results.title: EFL 'failed to execute rules' on finance with Bury

results.description: Divorce, temptations to gamble on Premier League riches and advising others not to buy are just some things owners of EFL clubs deal with.
results.shortTitle: 'Owning a club cost me my marriage'
results.title: Gambling on Premier League riches, divorce and ego trips - what it's like to own a EFL club

results.description: The final club left in the pot in the FA Cup first-round draw is set to receive a bye to the second round, after Bury's expulsion.
results.shortTitle: Bury absence to hand side FA Cup bye
results.title: FA Cup first round: Bury expulsion means bye to second round for one team

results.description: Improving the owners' and directors' test would not solely prevent financial problems for clubs in future, says Jonathan Taylor QC.
results.shortTitle: Improved owner test 'would not address all problems'
results.title: New owners' and directors' test would not solely prevent financial issues, says review leader

results.description: A winding-up petition against Bury Football Club is adjourned for a further two weeks in the High Court.
results.shortTitle: Bury get 14-day extension at High Court
results.title: Bury FC: HM Revenue & Customs winding-up petition adjourned for 14 days

results.description: Bury FC fan: "The fans are still here, they still exist. They just haven't got a game to go to."
results.shortTitle: The female football fans with no games to watch
results.title: Bury FC's loyal female fans photographed for fanzine

thumbnail.altText: Female Bury FC having their photo taken inside the stadium at Gigg Lane.

results.description: A prospective buyer for Bury FC withdraws their interest after doing due diligence, says supporters' group Forever Bury.
results.shortTitle: Proposed Bury buyer withdraws interest
results.title: Bury: Prospective buyer withdraws interest after due diligence on club

results.description: Bury will apply for a place in the National League after a proposal to readmit them to League Two next season was rejected.
results.shortTitle: Bury to apply for National League place
results.title: Bury to apply for National League place as 'active and credible' bidders for club remain in place

results.description: A proposal for Bury to be readmitted to League Two next season is rejected by EFL clubs at a meeting on Thursday.
results.shortTitle: Bury will not be readmitted into EFL
results.title: Bury will not be readmitted into League Two next season after meeting of member clubs

results.description: BBC Sport takes a look at the demise of Maidstone United, the last club before Bury to drop out of the English Football League.
results.shortTitle: The demise & rise of Maidstone United
results.title: Maidstone United: The demise and rise of an expelled Football League club

results.description: Bury could take a crucial step towards reinstatement into the English Football League at a pivotal meeting of the 71 member clubs on Thursday.
results.shortTitle: EFL clubs to vote on Bury request
results.title: Bury: EFL members to vote on club's request to be in League Two next year

results.description: West Bromwich Albion sign defender Saul Shotton, one of the Bury players without a club after their expulsion from the EFL.
results.shortTitle: West Brom sign ex-Bury defender Shotton
results.title: Saul Shotton: West Bromwich Albion sign former Bury defender

results.description: A working group set up to try to have Bury reinstated to League Two in 2020-21 sends its proposal to the EFL.
results.shortTitle: Bury 'rescue board' submits plans to EFL
results.title: Bury: 'Rescue board' of expelled Shakers submits plans for future of club to EFL

results.description: Tranmere Rovers sign former Bury captain Neil Danns on a deal until the end of the season.
results.shortTitle: Tranmere sign veteran midfielder Danns
results.title: Neil Danns: Tranmere Rovers sign former Bury captain

results.description: The EFL commissions a review into its regulations and procedures on financial sustainability following Bury's expulsion.
results.shortTitle: EFL to hold review after Bury demise
results.title: Bury: EFL commissions independent review of regulations after club's demise
